sentences.sContent: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
sentences.sCn: 有人见到我的钥匙吗？我哪儿都找不到。

sentences.sContent: The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
sentences.sCn: 我和警察说了，他们很帮忙。

sentences.sContent: I lent him several books, but he hasn’t read any of them.
sentences.sCn: 我借给他几本书，但他一本还没看过。

trans.tranOther: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about
used when talking about someone who may be male or female, to avoid saying ‘him or her’
